cmdHandler.interactionFailed: An error occurred and the command failed to run. Please try again.
cmdHandler.databaseAddFailed: An error occured while loading the default configuration. Please try again.

servers.serverRemoved: Successfully removed the following server from the database:

servers.maxServers: Only 5 saved servers are allowed per guild. Please delete one before continuing.
servers.aliasNotFound: Unable to locate a saved server with that alias.
servers.noSaved: No Saved Servers have been configured in this guild.
servers.aliasLength: Server alias length must be less than 50 characters.
servers.aliasTaken: A saved server with that alias already exists in this guild.
servers.ipLength: Your IP Address/Domain name must be between 5 and 253 characters. Please check your command and try again.
servers.badPort: Port argument must be between 1 and 65535. Please check your command and try again.

embedsCommand.aliasLength: Embed alias length must be less than 50 characters.
embedsCommand.maxTemplates: Only 10 embed templates are allowed per guild. Please delete one before continuing.

embedsCommand.aliasTaken: An embed template with that alias already exists in this guild.
embedsCommand.templateRemoved: Successfully removed the following template from the database:

embedsCommand.noBlank: You must specify a header, footer or body text for online and offline embeds.
embedsCommand.removeDefault: You may not remove the default templates.
embedsCommand.invalidHexCode: The color code entered is invalid. Color code must begin with # and cointain hexidecimal characters.

compatCommand.triggerAdded: Successfully added compatibility trigger to the database
compatCommand.badIndex: Unable to locate a compatibility trigger with that index.
compatCommand.triggerRemoved: Successfully removed compatibility trigger from the database.
compatCommand.ipLength: Your IP Address/Hostname must be between 5 and 253 characters. Please check your command and try again.
compatCommand.triggerLength: Compatibility trigger length must be less than 50 characters.
compatCommand.maxTriggers: Only 25 compatibility triggers are allowed per guild. Please delete one before continuing.

invite.embedBody:
Want to add Minecraft Server Status to your server? 
 [Click here to invite the bot](https://discord.com/api/oauth2/authorize?client_id=652726107535310859&permissions=52304&scope=bot) 
 
 Interested in the beta program? 
 [Click here to invite the Beta bot](https://123computer.net/mcss/beta)

help.embedTitle: Click here to read the documentation!
help.embedBody:
Still need help? 
 [Click here to join the support server!](https://discord.gg/szr7VgVxzQ) 
 
 [Check out our video tutorial!](https://123computer.net/mcss/tutorial)

status.badPort: Port argument must be between 1 and 65535. Please check your command and try again.
status.ipLength: Your IP Address/Hostname must be between 5 and 253 characters. Please check your command and try again.
status.noServer: No server specified. Please use the **server** option to select a saved server by its alias or use the **address** and **port** options to specify a different server.
status.aliasNotFound: Unable to locate a saved server with that alias.

automsg.noServer: No server specified. Please use the **server** option to select a saved server by its alias or use the **address** and **port** options to specify a different server.
automsg.aliasNotFound: Unable to locate a saved server with that alias.
automsg.embedNotFound: Unable to locate an embed template with that alias.
automsg.success: The Live Status Panel was generated successfully.
automsg.channelType: The **automsg** command can only be used in regular server text channels.
automsg.badThumbnail: Your thumbnail must be under 5MB in size and in BMP, GIF, JPEG or PNG format.
automsg.maxElements: The maximum number of Live Status elements for this guild has been reached. Please delete one and try again or request higher limits in the support server.

disabled.deadPanel: The Minecraft server has been unreachable for over two weeks and this Live Status Panel has been disabled.
disabled.channelType: The type of this channel has been changed and live status has been disabled. This feature is only compatible with text channels.

embeds.footerText: Generated by Minecraft Server Status Bot

permissions.blacklisted: You are blacklisted from using Minecraft Server Status. Reason:
permissions.restricted: You do not have sufficent permissions to access that command.
permissions.noDM: This command can't be used in a direct message.
permissions.botScope: This feature requires the bot user to be present. Please re-invite the application with the bot scope enabled.
permissions.channelPerms: Unable to process your request because the bot lacks the **Send Messages, Embed Links**, **View Channel** or **Attach Files** permission. Please ensure the bot has these permissions in your server or contact the server's staff.
permissions.manageChannel: Unable to process your request because the bot lacks the **Manage Channel** permission. Please ensure the bot has these permissions in your server or contact the server's staff.
